transcript:
Customer: Raghu Nandan Raghav Ram hai
Hello
Hello
Executive: Good afternoon Ravi bhai
Customer: Hanji
Executive: Good afternoon ji
Customer: Hanji
Executive: Aapka call kiya 9696 number pe
Customer: Hanji
Executive: Ha to issue face kar rahe hai na aap
Customer: Issue wo ye hai kuch kaam hi nahi aa raha work hi nahi aa raha kuch upar se na lead aa rahi hai na koi call aa rahi hai na information aa rahi hai na kuch aa rahi hai
Lead aa rahi hai lead deal nahi ho pa rahi hai
Executive: Dekhiye Ravi bhai aap use karenge service to aap bhi main aapko showcase kar deta hu aapko dikha deta hu one to one maine us time bhi bola tha
Customer: To kaise use kare hum pehle matlab hum do saal se kisi cheez ko use kar rahe hai hum pe aata hi nahi hai use karna wo cheez
Abhi Deepawali tak bhi sahi use ho rahi thi Deepawali ke baad ye bhul gaye hum use karna
Ye aapko sirf samne wale se paise ka matlab hai ki paisa isme dal do itna
Executive: Sir sir Ravi bhai ek baat bataye maine Shivani madam ko jab one to one discussion hua tha tab maine bhai nahi dikhaya wo maine showcase nahi karaya one to one unke hi
Customer: Nahi main ye keh raha hu mere paas bhi call bahut aati thi pehle
Customer ki India Mart se number milaya aapka ab to ye kuch bhi nahi aa raha hai kaisa bhi nahi aa raha hai kuch nahi aa raha hai zara bhi
Executive: Sir dekhiye samjhe us cheez ko maine ek cheez samjhaya tha aapko jab competition badhta hai na aapka listing according aap samjhe na maine us time bhi bataya tha abhi kam
Customer: Aap pehle apna phone badal lijiyega jab baat kijiyega ab main itna sir mein dard ho jata hai aap se baat karne mein pehle ya to apna phone badal lijiye ya apni language badaliye hamare samajh mein kuch nahi aa raha aap kya bolte hain
Executive: Sir normal mein baat kar raha hu aapke sath
Customer: Ha bataye
Executive: Main bol raha hu main aapka video meeting schedule kar raha hu waha one to one hum discussion kar lete hai is cheez se main aapko lead aur inquiry aur call wo sari cheeze showcase kara dunga aapka
Ki kaise wo badhta hai ab kya karna hai humko
Executive: Sir isiliye maine us time bhi bola tha jab mera Shivani madam ke sath discussion hua tha
Customer: Are madam ko maro goli tum mujhse baat karo yaar mujhe batao
Executive: Kuch tabhi to main puch raha hu ki jo banda service use kare wo mere sath baithe na meeting ke andar
Customer: Tum kaise baithe yaar pehle baithe to the wo actually lead aa rahi thi sare kaam aa rahe the lekin ab to ekdam gayab si ho gayi hai na koi customer ke phone aa rahe hai to matlab aap samjhaoge Shivani madam ko jab wo phone aaya karenge waha se
Executive: Sir use karne ka sahi hota hai na to pura
Customer: Nahi ye batao aap aapko koi tension nahi aap mat dijiye lead mat kuch kijiyega lekin main to upar tak complaint dal dunga ki bhaiya aise aise thagi karti hai India Mart company
Executive: Nahi sir aap jo Anil ji khol ke gaye hai main unko baat karunga unse Trust wo aati hai aisa kuch nahi hai sir
Customer: Matlab aap to ye soch rahe hai ki main unko batata hu batata hu kya batayenge aap pehle aapne bataya tha jo apne aap deal kar rahi thi wo
Executive: Sir Ravi bhai pehle to ek kaam kijiye aap meeting par aaiye main aapko pehle wo cheez sikhaunga jaha performance chal raha hai usko improve karenge aapka call bhi badhega inquiry bhi badhega usko samjhiye
Customer: To kya karna chahiye hume
Executive: Sir aapke jo aap by lead jo utha rahe hai wo zero se uthana hai most probably zero to four hours ke andar ka by lead aap nahi utha rahe jyada
Customer: Aapki samajh mein nahi aa rahi aap se main kya baat karu aapki language mujhe samajh mein nahi aa rahi
Voice bilkul nahi aa rahi aapki jo mujhe sunna chahiye
Executive: Sir meeting schedule kar raha hu sir meeting schedule kar raha hu Ravi bhai usme aap aa jaiye join kar lijiye usko main waha aapko showcase kara dunga sari cheeze
Customer: Kitni der mein meeting karoge aap
Executive: Kya bol rahe hai
Customer: Kitna time lagega
Executive: Sir hardly 10 minute lagega
Customer: Kariye ga
Executive: Aapko samajhna hai wo tabhi to samajh aayegi na
Customer: Sir main to Aligarh nikal raha hu na abhi is vajah se puch raha hu koi jyada time lagta hai to batao
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi sir dekhiye wo samajh jayenge aap aapko samajh aa jayega procedure kya hai kahan lack ho raha hai hamara to improve hota dikhega aapko is cheez mein
Samajh gaye aap
Customer: Achcha
Executive: Main aapko ha waha dikhega aapko don't worry Ravi bhai aapke waha pe finally maine isi cheez pe conversation kiya tha ki aapko kaise kaam karna hai kaise improve karni hai cheeze
Bas ab aap schedule kar aap khud samajh lijiye is cheez ko
Ek minute dijiye mail check kijiye aap apna
Customer: Ruk dekhiye kya keh rahe hai
Hello
Executive: Shivani mail check kijiye maine Shivani mam bhej rahi hai
Customer: Ji ji
Executive: Hello Google meet ka link share kara hai wo join kar kara dijiye ek baar
Customer: Aapne matlab whatsapp pe
Executive: Nahi nahi mam mail pe
Kaise join karne wale hai aap mobile phone ke through ya laptop ke through
Customer: Sir mobile se hi kar lu to
Executive: Laptop se karenge to jyada behtar rahega mam khud se hi main aapki screen se show karane wala hu sari cheeze aap laptop se join kare
Customer: Theek hai sir theek hai
Executive: Ha main call band karu mam
Customer: Theek hai main laptop se hi karti hu
Executive: Ha join kijiye aap Shivani mam ek cheez main discuss karna chahunga aap puchna chahunga aap se mera jo last conversation hua tha on Google meet aapke sath kya aapko cheeze clarify nahi hui thi waha pe jo maine aapko guide kiya tha wo sari cheeze
Customer: Sir main wo sari cheeze to samajh aa gayi sara kuch ho gaya tha lekin problem kahan hai pata hai dekho abhi mujhe na 15 se 20 din ho gaye
Aur Diwali ke baad hi samjho matlab ek bhi deal final nahi hui hai pura one month ho gaya
Ek bhi deal final nahi hui hai jo bhi deal suniye jo bhi main update leti hu usme kya hota hai wo fake nikalti hai GST proof bhi hoti hai ki humko iski requirement nahi hai lekin udhar show karta hai isme requirement nahi batata aap khud bhi dekh sakte ho koi bhi deal final nahi hui hai
Aur na inquiry inquiry bhi bilkul nahi aa rahi hai sir aur aapne jo bataya tha na maine sara update sab kuch kar diya uske bavajud bhi koi bhi inquiry nahi aa rahi hai
Executive: Dono ek kaam kijiye aap dono baith jaiye Ravi sir bhi aur aapko bhi dono ko clarify kar deta hu kahan pe lack aa raha hai hamara kahan mistake chal rahi hai hamari aap ek kaam kijiye aap meeting mein aaiye pehle dono
Customer: Sir aap phone apna call cut kijiye main join karti hu laptop se
Executive: Theek hai theek hai main call disconnect kar raha hu
Customer: Okay
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving leads or calls.

- Deals are not being finalized.

- Feels IndiaMART is only after money.



Resolution:

- Executive offered a video meeting to showcase leads.

- Executive scheduled a meeting to resolve issues.

- Executive shared Google Meet link on mail.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will join the meeting via laptop.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, meeting, issues
